description:
In February Spirax Sarco UK trusted Wellmi to deliver education to their staff on physical and mental wellbeing as part of their EMEA Conference.
Attendees enjoyed interactive content which included Mindfulness techniques like EFT, Physical wellbeing elements such as desk Pilates and nutritional education and discussion.
Some amazing efforts from the team over all three days including their paper airplane creations below (all part of the Physical Wellbeing In The Workplace Workshop).
Well done Spirax Sarco EMEA for taking such a fantastic approach to the welfare of your workforce. We can't wait to work with you and you're amazing team again soon.
“I worked with Ben to scope the objectives and content for the three wellbeing sessions he delivered at our Virtual Divisional Conference. From all the preparation to the actual delivery, Ben was the consummate professional at every stage of the process, resulting in some highly engaging and popular sessions.” – Melanie McCall EMEA Head of HR 
“Ben did such a great job at our EMEA Leadership conference that we have invited him to share his great advice, delivered in such a nice and engaging way, to my Regional conference for which we are expecting 200+ people to attend.” – Andrew Stewart EMEA Regional General Manager for Northern Europe
title: Spirax Sarco EMEA leading by example with employee wellbeing education.
